text: Today on the West Coast, itâ€™s looking rough with 8 ft @8s NW swell and fresh 31 mph NNW winds making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions improve slightly with 3 ft @9s WNW swell and lighter 16 mph SW winds, but still not ideal. By the day after, we see a nice bump to 4 ft @10s WNW with 10 mph WNW winds, making it the best day of the three. Best: day after.
